name: Classic Boy's Romper sewing pattern
description:
Classic Boy's Romper 
sewing pattern
All Sizes Included: 6 months - 4T


*INSTANT DOWNLOAD pattern - your sewing pattern will be emailed to you instantly after your payment is processed. No waiting! More time sewing! :) 

*This can also be a REVERSIBLE Boy's Romper if you line it with another fabric you love instead of a basic white lining!

Do you want your little boy to have that sweet, classic style? Do you love a simple monogram or an appliqué on the front of his rompers? Then this basic romper pattern is perfect for you!! You can embroider or appliqué this romper to truly make it your own design! It’s the perfect blank canvas for your sweet little boy or leave it plain and show off a great plaid, seersucker, gingham or more!

This Classic Boy's Romper pattern features a classic scoop neck and button straps at the shoulders. No zippers or snaps with this simple pattern. Even if this is your first sewing project, you can do it! Start sewing today! 

This sewing pattern features 29 clear photo illustrations and detailed, tutorial style instructions to help you create your very own Classic Boy’s Romper.

Full-size and color-coded pattern pieces are included for all sizes 6 months – 4T. Simply print, tape together, cut and get sewing! This pattern is very user friendly even for beginners!

ALL SIZES are included in this pattern - 6 months - 4 T.

*As always, if you ever have a question while sewing, simply email me and I am always glad to help!

name: Love Me Knots Dress sewing pattern
description:
The Love Me Knots Dress Sewing Pattern
Pattern includes all girls' sizes: 6 months - 12 years


PDF SEWING PATTERN FOR Girls/ TUTORIAL STYLE / LOADS OF PHOTOS!

Do you want to sew dresses that look like they came straight from a magazine or boutique? Well you can with The Love Me Knots Dress pattern that is QUICK, EASY and TRENDY! 

With its classic scoop neckline, tie shoulder straps, stripwork pieced skirt and coordinating lower panel, this modern look is surely in style. Sew this dress using three coordinating fabrics to show off your favorites! 

This dress can even be worn year-round: simply add a long-sleeved shirt underneath and a pair of ruffled leggings in cooler weather. In the warmer months it can be worn alone as a dress, with bloomers, or as an outfit when worn with ruffled capris or ruffled pants.

Even if this is your first sewing project, you can do it! Start sewing today!

This sewing pattern features 50 clear photo illustrations and detailed, tutorial-style instructions to help you create your very own Love Me Knots Dress! 

*Full-sized computer-generated pattern pieces in sizes 6 months – 12 years are included. Simply print, cut out and get sewing!

*All sizes 6 months- 12 years are included, 19 total pages in this PDF pattern; 3 pages of pattern pieces

Let’s get sewing!

Features:
-sizes XS-XL are included
-pattern pieces included for the bodice and strips for the dress
-bodice pattern includes a regular or slim fit option
-50 photo illustrations
-full-color photographs
-two strap options (grosgrain ribbon or fabric straps)
-save to your computer to reprint anytime
-tutorial style instructions 
-step-by-step directions
-great for beginners through advanced
-empire waist 
-boutique dress style
-NO BUTTONS 
-NO ZIPPERS
- NO SERGER required

Create your own Love Me Knots Dress in an afternoon!

Add this item to your cart and pay using PayPal. 

Your pattern will be sent to you as an instant download after your order is received. Save it to your computer to print and reprint anytime to create an outfit in any size (girl's sizes 6months - 10 years).

This pattern will help you create a boutique outfit for that special little girl in your life, even if you are a BEGINNER sewer! Happy Sewing!

Enjoy and Happy Sewing!

name: The Alysha Top for WOMEN (XS-XXL)
description:
The Alysha Top Sewing Pattern for Women

All Sizes included: XS-XXL (sizes 0-24)
*Pattern pieces included for all sizes

Are you a fabric lover who wants to make something quick, easy and blousy to wear tonight? Then The Alysha Top sewing pattern is just for you!

 This sewing pattern will help you create a classic, scoop-necked, short-sleeved (kimono style) top with an elastic waistband in no time at all! This style shirt is unbelievable easy since it comes with one pattern piece for the front and the back. The sleeves are drawn into this pattern piece, instead of having to cut them out separately. This saves you time and frustration. You can make this in one sitting! 

The Alysha Top is quick and easy to make and can be made in a variety of fabric! Imagine this in a vibrant, graphic-printed fabric or a jewel tone to really make a statement! Create it in bold stripes or a chevron print. Whatever your style, you are the designer! 

*All sizes XS – XXL (sizes 0-22) are included in this pattern. This pattern features 25 photo illustrations and tutorial-style instructions to help you create your very own Alysha Top.
 Full-sized, color-coded pattern pieces are included for all sizes. Petite and Regular size widths are also included. Let’s get sewing!

Features:

-25 photo illustrations
-tutorial style instructions 
-color-coded pattern pieces
-print on regular computer paper on your home printer!
-save to your computer and reprint anytime - in any size 
-easy to read sizing chart
-step-by-step directions
-great for beginners
-no zippers or buttons - very simple!
- NO SERGER required

Create your own Alysha Top in about an hour!

name: Mimi Maxi Dress for Women sewing pattern
description:
PDF SEWING PATTERN FOR WOMEN/ TUTORIAL STYLE / LOADS OF PHOTOS!

*This pattern also works as a maternity maxi dress sewing pattern!

Have you been looking for a maxi dress that is simple, stylish and figure flattering? This maxi dress has an elasticized top that stays comfortably in place and an elasticized empire waist to give you a sleek silhouette. Three strap options allow you to wear this dress without the fear of your litle one tugging it down when you wear it. Strap options include: straight shoulder straps, criss-crossed shoulder straps or a single halter strap that ties into a knot or a bow behind your neck. 

Wear your dress during the day with sandals, flats or flip-flops and at night dress it up with some heels. This dress looks great in solids or even bold and modern eye-catching prints. You can even use two fabrics that match your personal style and personality. You will LOVE making and wearing this dress! Sew one today! 

*All sizes XS – XL are included, 19 pages of instructions, 53 photo illustrations.

This pattern features 53 photo illustrations and tutorial style instructions to help you create your very own Mimi Maxi Dress. Dress pieces are made using exact measurements which make this dress have the perfect fit – no paper pattern pieces for the dress are included. Hemming tips for petite or tall lengths are also included along with strap options. The Mimi Maxi Dress sewing pattern will help you become Seamingly Smitten!

name: Little Lady Jacket sewing pattern

This sewing pattern will help you sew a boutique styled, long sleeved and ruffle collared jacket. The raglan sleeves make this jacket quick to create and there is no gathering and insetting of the sleeves. Simply pin and sew! You can even add a pop of coordinating color as the lining.

Even if you have never sewn a lined piece of clothing before or a jacket, you can sew this one! Three buttons keep this jacket closed, or if you are a beginner you can use Velcro strips without having to deal with buttons or buttonholes. This sewing pattern is for every level of sewing! name: Sadie Grace Nightgown for Girls Sewing Pattern

name: Catherine's Ruffle Top Dress sewing pattern
description:
Looking for a quick dress to sew for your little girl? Do you want a dress that is light and airy and fun to wear all Spring and Summer long? Then this dress is perfect for you! 

The Seaside Dress features a ruffle around the top, a coordinating panel along the bottom and shoulder straps that criss-cross in the back and button. With its scoop neckline, buttoned shoulder straps, slightly flared A-Line bodice and coordinating gathered panel, this classic look is surely in style. Sew this jumper using two coordinating fabrics or mix a solid and a print. It can even be worn through each season. Simply add a long sleeved shirt underneath when the weather is cooler paired with tights or ruffled pants and in the warmer months it can be worn alone. description:
Do you love wearing your yoga pants, but are shocked by the prices in stores? Well fret no more! With this YOGA pants pattern you can MAKE them yourself! 

These YOGA pants feature a fold-over knit waistband, come in cropped or full-length versions and there are four full-length hems available so you get the best fit and length! Raise the waistband up for more coverage or fold it over to give it a low-rise look. They even include a hidden pocket to hold your valuables while you exercise! The Women’s YOGA Pants pattern sews together easily and it never goes out of style!

No elastic needs to be inserted and you do not need a serger to make these! Just one ballpoint needle and some knit in the color of your choice and you are ready to start!
